block.p: Alexis Elizabeth Christoforous, a financial reporter, and Karl Peter Kilb III, a lawyer, were married yesterday. Msgr. Lawrence Connaughton performed the ceremony at St. Joseph's of Yorkville Church in Manhattan.

The bride, 29, will continue to use her name professionally. She works in Manhattan, appearing on the television reports of CBS MarketWatch, which are seen on WCBS-TV in New York and on other CBS television stations. The bride graduated cum laude from New York University. She is a daughter of June and Alexander Christoforous of Brooklyn. Her father retired as the manager of Josephine's, a former restaurant in Manhattan.

Alexis Elizabeth Christoforous, a financial reporter, and Karl Peter Kilb III, a lawyer, were married yesterday. Msgr. Lawrence Connaughton performed the ceremony at St. Joseph's of Yorkville Church in Manhattan.

The bride, 29, will continue to use her name professionally. She works in Manhattan, appearing on the television reports of CBS MarketWatch, which are seen on WCBS-TV in New York and on other CBS television stations. The bride graduated cum laude from New York University. She is a daughter of June and Alexander Christoforous of Brooklyn. Her father retired as the manager of Josephine's, a former restaurant in Manhattan.

Mr. Kilb, 35, is the manager of the legal and compliance department at Bloomberg, the financial news organization, in Manhattan. He graduated magna cum laude from N.Y.U. and received his law degree from Fordham University. He is a son of Mr. and Mrs. Kilb of Pearl River, N.Y. The bridegroom's mother, Janet Kilb, is a customer service representative in Englewood Cliffs. N.J., for Unilever, the consumer products maker. His father retired as an accounting manager for the AT&T Corporation in Basking Ridge, N.J.
